TEXT: Adds a new playable character: The Adventurer.
Let foil cards appear on any character!
Choose a card to put on top of your draw pile and make free until played.
#yQuest: End your turn with an empty hand. NL #yReward: Shuffle #yThe #yEternity #yGem into your draw pile.
#yQuest: Kill an enemy. NL #yReward: Add #yThe #yWhale into your hand.
#yFoil cards. NL #yReward: Play your last played card again.
#yQuest: Gain #b13 #yBlock. NL #yReward: Shuffle #yThe #yGem #ySearch into your draw pile.
Energy in a single turn. NL #yReward: A random enemy loses #b
Offer only valid with an empty potion slot.
Choose a card to add into your hand.
Choose a card to put into your hand.

TEXT_DICT.SP: Start with a random common relic instead of The Rod.
The first time you #yDelve each combat, shuffle #yWaka #yWaka into your draw pile. (It's a cost #b2 #yAttack that deals #b10 damage.)
Cards created by this have #yRetain stickers.
TEXT_DICT.F1: Add a random #yAttack of any color into your hand.

TEXT_DICT.SP: Whenever you obtain a card with #yDelve, gain #b25 Gold.
Cards with Delve are not discarded at the end of your turn.
TEXT_DICT.F1: Every 3 Delves, deal #b20 damage to ALL enemies and increase this damage by 10 for the rest of combat.

TEXT_DICT.SP: Start combat with #b1 Orb slot for each #yDelve card in your deck.

TEXT: It's me! When you end your turn with unused Energy, I'll deal #b
damage to a random enemy! Yaya!

TEXT_DICT.SP: When you end your turn with unused Energy, Fire the Cannon to deal #b5 damage to a random enemy.
Start combat with four Spells. When they run out, refill them with Upgraded Spells!
TEXT_DICT.F1: Put a random Spell into your hand.
Gain #b1 #yStrength and play the top card of your draw pile.

TEXT: As the Adventurer, complete the Ending on Ascension Level 20.
As the Adventurer, win a run with every Delve Bonus.
As the Adventurer, use Twinkle Twinkle to play a Rare card from your draw pile.
As the Adventurer, play a Foil copy of The Eternity Gem.
